meta.name: description
meta.value: Tell the user what setting we changed, and to what.

parameter.name: wasSmartVolumeDisabled
parameter.description: Indicates if smart volume was just disabled

parameter.name: setting
parameter.description: The setting that the user changed.

parameter.name: deviceState
parameter.description: Contains details about the userâ€™s device.

parameter.name: isStickyOffsetEnabledUp
parameter.description: Indicates whether the siri voice volume sticky offset was enabled and increased for subsequent tts.

parameter.name: isStickyOffsetEnabledDown
parameter.description: Indicates whether the siri voice volume sticky offset was enabled and lowered for subsequent tts.
